trans-unit.source: Provides access to the main buffered graphics context object for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: Gir tilgang til det primære bufret konteksten grafikkobjektet for programdomenet.

trans-unit.source: The BufferedGraphicsManager class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics.
trans-unit.target: Klassen BufferedGraphicsManager lar deg til å implementere egendefinerte doble hurtigbufring for grafikk.

trans-unit.source: Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface.
trans-unit.target: Grafikk som bruker doble bufring kan redusere eller fjerne flimmer som forårsakes av oppdatering en visning overflate.

trans-unit.source: This class has one static property, <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>, which returns the main <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen er en statisk egenskapen <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>, som returnerer hovedvinduet <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>for gjeldende programdomenet.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> class creates <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> instances that can be used to draw buffered graphics.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>klassen oppretter <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>forekomster som kan brukes til å tegne bufret grafikk.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> class has no public constructor and must be created by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object for an application domain using its <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>klassen har ingen offentlig konstruktør og må opprettes ved den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>objekt for et program domenet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object for the current application domain from the static <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hente den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>objekt for gjeldende programdomenet fra statiske <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: For more information on double buffering, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, and <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon på doble bufring [doble bufret grafikk](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, og <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"></xref> for the current application domain.
Within an application the Current property always returns the same <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object.
trans-unit.target: Et program gjeldende egenskapen returnerer alltid det samme <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"></xref> for the current application domain.
